content:
Your task is to create a concise running summary of actions and information results in the provided text, focusing on key and potentially important information to remember.

You will receive the current summary and the your latest actions. Combine them, adding relevant key information from the latest development in 1st person past tense and keeping the summary concise.

Summary So Far:
"""
I received an error message when attempting to use the "message_agent" command with an invalid key. I then used the "google" command to search for legal implications of artificial intelligence and received a list of relevant articles and publications. Later, I used the "read_file" command to access the "average.py" file and received the code for a function that calculates the average of a list of numbers.
"""

Latest Development:
"""
[Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "execute_python_code", "args": {"code": "import math\\n\\nradius = 5\\narea = math.pi * radius ** 2\\n\\nprint(f\'The area of a circle with radius {radius} is {area:.2f}\')", "basename": "circle_area.py"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command execute_python_code returned: The area of a circle with radius 5 is 78.54\n', type='action_result'), Message(role='you', content='{"command": {"name": "google", "args": {"query": "legal implications of using artificial intelligence in the workplace"}}}', type='ai_response'), Message(role='your computer', content='Command google returned: ["https://www.americanbar.org/groups/labor_law/publications/labor_employment_law_news/spring-2022/ai-in-the-workplace/", "https://hbr.org/2019/04/the-legal-and-ethical-implications-of-using-ai-in-hiring", "https://www.frontiersin.org/articles/10.3389/fsurg.2022.862322/full", "https://www.weforum.org/agenda/2016/10/top-10-ethical-issues-in-artificial-intelligence/", "https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC8963864/", "https://www.sciencedirect.com/science/article/pii/S2666659620300056", "https://frostbrowntodd.com/the-use-and-legal-ramifications-of-artificial-intelligence-entering-the-workforce/", "https://news.bloomberglaw.com/us-law-week/employers-should-consider-these-risks-when-employees-use-chatgpt"]', type='action_result')]
"""
